resources.string:
Contact: christophe.versieux@gmail.com

This app is still in early development phase. But I think that it is now ready to be used and help Android users.

Feel free to contact me for any request or suggestion.

Please wait a few moments.

This applications wakes up each time your battery drops 1%, and then records the time in the database.

NOTE: The battery-drain analysis report requires at least a 2-point drop to be viewable. Please allow for this point-drop to occur to view the report.
Perhaps use the phone a little more! :)

Enjoy!
Important: All values just after a charge are not taken in account as they are not totally accurate.
At first item after a charge
2 first value are inaccurate, please wait for more data.
